pnTable.name: Master Spectral Data Representation Mode Table

reference.title: Product Name Standard Document
reference.organization: Fleet Numerical Meteorology and Oceanography Center

reference.title: GRIB 2
reference.infoUsed: GRIB2 Spectral Data Representation Mode, table 3.7

entry.name: complex number F
entry.description: The complex number F sub n sup m (see code figure 1 in Code Table 3.6) are stored for m>= 0 as pairs of real number Re(F sub n sup m), Im(F sub n sup m) ordered with n increasing from m to N(m), first for m=0 and then for m=1, 2, ... M.
